welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yanbu, Taiwan! Nestled between the mountains and the sea, this charming city is known for its beautiful beaches and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Yanbu has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaoshiung International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Kaoshiung International Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tainan Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
